name: Format\FadingStickyHeader
description: The scene that briefly keeps a header at the top of the screen as the user scrolls through the article.

properties.name: fadeColor
properties.description: The color the header background will fade to, defined as a 3- to 8-character hexadecimal string or a color name string.

properties.name: type
properties.description: Always fading_sticky_header for this scene type.
